attributes.action: Prosecute MP Derek Conway for Fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP Derek Conway  my be an elected official however; it does not exempt him from the law no mater his status.

We here by call for prosecution MP Derek Conway for knowningly stealing money from the public purse for personal gain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
